item.title: 508 talk
item.dc:creator: @marcel1 marcel@war-missions.nl
item.description:
@marcel1 wrote:

how can i make you can talk to a npcs i got:

if(pnp.npcType == 945)
{
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 945, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Warscape Guider”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Warscape, warscape is nog lang niet af…”, 241, 4);
}
